mapper.sql: object_id AS "objectId" , use_type AS "useType" , data_type AS "dataType" , object_code AS "objectCode" , object_name AS "objectName" , object_comment AS "objectComment" , object_display_name AS "objectDisplayName" , regex AS "regex" , char_max_length AS "charMaxLength" , char_min_length AS "charMinLength" , max_value AS "maxValue" , min_value AS "minValue" , datetime_precision AS "datetimePrecision" , numeric_precision AS "numericPrecision" , numeric_scale AS "numericScale" , is_enum AS "isEnum" , enum_key AS "enumKey" , enum_value AS "enumValue"

sql.set: object_id = #{objectId}, use_type = #{useType}, data_type = #{dataType}, object_code = #{objectCode}, object_name = #{objectName}, object_comment = #{objectComment}, object_display_name = #{objectDisplayName}, regex = #{regex}, char_max_length = #{charMaxLength}, char_min_length = #{charMinLength}, max_value = #{maxValue}, min_value = #{minValue}, datetime_precision = #{datetimePrecision}, numeric_precision = #{numericPrecision}, numeric_scale = #{numericScale}, is_enum = #{isEnum}, enum_key = #{enumKey}, enum_value = #{enumValue},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dic_data_definition ( object_id, use_type, data_type, object_code, object_name, object_comment, object_display_name, regex, char_max_length, char_min_length, max_value, min_value, datetime_precision, numeric_precision, numeric_scale, is_enum, enum_key, enum_value ) VALUES ( #{objectId}, #{useType}, #{dataType}, #{objectCode}, #{objectName}, #{objectComment}, #{objectDisplayName}, #{regex}, #{charMaxLength}, #{charMinLength}, #{maxValue}, #{minValue}, #{datetimePrecision}, #{numericPrecision}, #{numericScale}, #{isEnum}, #{enumKey}, #{enumValue} )
